typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code } as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull({Code }),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stream1, stream2)
ConditionalSplit1@stream1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Code },
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@stream2 sink(input(
		Contract_Category_Code as string,
		Contract_Category_Code_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Contract_Category_Code = {Code },
		Contract_Category_Code_Desc = Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		Table as string,
		Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(Ref_Data_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		Ref_Data_ID as integer,
		Ref_Table as string,
		Ref_Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Ref_Data_ID,
		Reference_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Code } as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull({Code }),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stream1, Stream2)
ConditionalSplit1@Stream2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Code },
		Description
	),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@stream1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Code },
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		{Plan_ID                             } as string,
		Plan_Start_Date as string,
		Plan_End_Date as string,
		{Plan_Name_Description            } as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as integer,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		{market_Type                       } as string,
		{Grandfathered_Plan_Flag              } as string,
		{Metal_level                        } as integer,
		{Acturial_Value } as integer,
		Issuer_State as string,
		Issuer_ID as string,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		Plan_Benefit_ID as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date as string,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Description as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as integer,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		Benefit_Plan_Type_Code as integer,
		Population_Category_Code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(Plan_Start_Date = toDate(Plan_Start_Date),
		Plan_End_Date = toDate(Plan_End_Date)) ~> StringtoDate
source2 derive(Plan_Benefit_Start_Date = toDate(Plan_Benefit_Start_Date),
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date = toDate(Plan_Benefit_End_Date)) ~> PlanbenefitsStringtoDate
StringtoDate sink(input(
		Plan_ID as string,
		Plan_Start_Date as date,
		Plan_End_Date as date,
		Plan_Name_Description as string,
		Line_Of_Business as string,
		Plan_Product_Code as string,
		market_Type as string,
		Grandfathered_Plan_Flag as string,
		Metal_level as string,
		Acturial_Value as string,
		Issuer_State as string,
		Issuer_ID as string,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Plan_ID = {Plan_ID                             },
		Plan_Start_Date,
		Plan_End_Date,
		Plan_Name_Description = {Plan_Name_Description            },
		Line_Of_Business = {Line_Of_Business                  },
		Plan_Product_Code = {Plan_Product_Code                 },
		market_Type = {market_Type                       },
		Grandfathered_Plan_Flag = {Grandfathered_Plan_Flag              },
		Metal_level = {Metal_level                        },
		Acturial_Value = {Acturial_Value },
		Issuer_State,
		Issuer_ID,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
PlanbenefitsStringtoDate sink(input(
		Plan_Benefit_ID as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date as date,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date as date,
		Plan_Benefit_Description as string,
		Line_Of_Business as string,
		Plan_Product_Code as string,
		Benefit_Plan_Type_Code as string,
		Population_Category_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Plan_Benefit_ID,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date,
		Plan_Benefit_Description,
		Line_Of_Business = {Line_Of_Business                  },
		Plan_Product_Code = {Plan_Product_Code                 },
		Benefit_Plan_Type_Code,
		Population_Category_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
